channel.title: Runescape help please
channel.description:
when i try to log on to runescape it says "connecting to update server" right, then after a while it says, "Error_game_js5connect - Unable to connect to update server."
i dont know the problem? i cant even log on with a rsbot client, i hope im not ip banned..

item.title: Runescape help please
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

View this topic.

Read full topic

item.title: Runescape help please
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

[quote=“kyled123, post:1, topic:248892”]when i try to log on to runescape it says “connecting to update server” right, then after a while it says, “Error_game_js5connect - Unable to connect to update server.”

i dont know the problem? i cant even log on with a rsbot client, i hope im not ip banned…[/quote]
You are unlikely to be IP Banned, but it looks like something if blocking you from the update server, meaning you can not access the game as you have not updated the files.
What firewall have you got on? What web browser do you use? And what anti virus are you using?

Read full topic
